name: PlatTris
description:
PlatTris joins Tetris together with a platformer. The blocks you place while playing Tetris form the level you play while platforming.

CONTROLS

Arrow Keys - Moving Tetrominos and Character (Up for harddrop in Tetris)

Z - Rotate Counter Clockwise and Jump/Double Jump

X - Rotate Clockwise and Shoot

L and J blocks spawn coins.

Z and S blocks spawn enemies.

Have fun!
